scripts.dev: concurrently -n demo,core,canvas,dom -c auto "bun run -F demo dev" "bun run -F @ladder/core dev" "bun run -F @ladder/canvas dev" "bun run -F @ladder/dom dev"
scripts.build: concurrently -n core,canvas,dom -c auto "bun run -F @ladder/core build" "bun run -F @ladder/canvas build" "bun run -F @ladder/dom build"
scripts.ladder:build:strict: concurrently --kill-others-on-fail -n core,canvas,dom -c auto "bun run -F @ladder/core build" "bun run -F @ladder/canvas build" "bun run -F @ladder/dom build"
